So either a separate supplier account needed to be set up or a new invoice obtained in GBP which is what was done and processed as soon as possible. Unfortunately, I fear this payment may have now fallen foul of the current covid-19 situation as many payments to America are not as smooth or easy as UK/Europe transactions." The paper can still be distributed under the CC-BY license, however". MM 23/02/21
